comments: sigma_2(n) is the sum of the squares of the divisors of n (A001157).
references: T. M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, 1976, page 39.
formula: Dirichlet g.f.: 1/(zeta(x)zeta(x-2))Multiplicative with a(p^1) = -1-p^2, a(p^2) = p^2, a(p^e) = 0 for e>=3. _Mitch Harris_ Jun 27, 2005.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 08 2000
